metadata.name: My first day in Web3
metadata.description:
"My first day in Web3" is an art piece about the Web3 discovery.

Drawn and animated by hand, "My first day in Web3" is a mixed of 2D and 3D technique. Inspired by Japanese anime, here is my own perception and feelings the first time I worked on Web3 : the power of the Web3 community, the discovery of cryptocurrency, virtual galleries, digital art marketplaces, web3-based video games. It was a portal to a new and innovative world.

This art is a piece of memory, a moment and a nostalgia: our very first meeting with Web3 world. For each of us, a reflection of a specific moment of our life that we only known.

Created by Rodger Liukane
Approx. time: 35hr
Procreate, Illustrator, AfterEffects, Photoshop and Cinema4D
Seamless loop in MP4
2480x3508px [A4 paper size]
